'''Margaret Organ-Kean''' is an American watercolour artist known for her work for [[Magic: The Gathering]]. She was contracted by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create artwork for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120227182548/http://www.organ-kean.com/bio.html|articlename=Biography|website=[https://web.archive.org/web/20120227183614/http://www.organ-kean.com/index.html Artist's website] (archived)}}</ref>
